entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential off-by-one error when using ScrollTo in CollectionView with a header. #18389
  • Preferences crash when debugging in Windows #18385
  • Design time type converters are needed #18383
  • Default MAUI Blazor app always has title 'BlazorWeb-CSharp' and doesn't open default file #18382
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix iOS Visual Runner so that all tests pass consistently #18378
    .NET 8 SR1
  • ListView not visible in Android for Net 8 in AbsoluteLayout if Width/Height not set #18377
  • Android - Event handler BatteryInfoChanged unsubscribe crashes when no subscribe has happened before #18376
    Backlog
  • Send SMS without opening default messaging app #18375
  • [Android,iOS] Real device crash on navigation #18372
  • iOS Shell navigating from a modal results in navigation bar color dissapearing #18371
  • [MAUI]Entering some text by PC keyboard or On-Screen Keyboard won't make the label turn green for API33 emulator. #18370
  • iOS SearchBar Unfocused Event not fired, Keyboard not disappearing. #18369
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState' #18368
  • CollecitionView snaps on scroll although snapping is disabled #18367
  • [Maui Embedded] DisconnectHandler not called when view is closed/disposed #18366
  • Many controls (mainly iOS) are not collected by GC #18365

Closed

  • FadeTo not completing on Samsung devices with visibility enhancement "Remove animations" turned on #16476
    .NET 8 GA
  • Animation CallBack action not invoked when enabled the battery-saver in Android device. #16478
    .NET 8 GA
  • maui .net7.0 DisplayAlert button hide on android 8.1 ? #18017
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] CollectionView with bound text of varying lengths does not properly measure all items #16234
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button.BorderColor not working on some platforms #18261
  • [WinUI] Top left corner of the TitleBar is currently unclickable when you update to WinAPPSDK 1.4 #17356
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst Picker not working #18363
  • Something isn't working #18116
  • .NET MAUI MacCatalyst Menu Bar items count problem #18054

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Device Info Test API 33 #18390
  • Fix project name substitution in Blazor template nav menu and "VS install" prompt #18388
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, .NET 8 GA
  • Add device test for PR #18356 #18387
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net8.0] Update stable branding #18384
    .NET 8 GA
  • Merge net8.0 into main #18380
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • .NET 8 template tweaks #18379
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump to xamarin/xamarin-android/release/8.0.1xx@b48acafb 34.0.39 #18381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Don't run 13.7 on xcode15 #18374
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Partially revert "[Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout (#14532) #18356
  • Support finding nearest TFM to collect assets from #18068
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • [dependabot] Limit to 0 pr's #18346
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add border visual tests #17633
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
